keyMoments.title: Watchdog Unit Debut
keyMoments.description: The Watchdog Unit of the Law are introduced as Enies Lobby's first class guards. Baskerville sends one hundred members to defend against the invasion.
keyMoments.significance: Introduction of Enies Lobby's elite defensive force.

keyMoments.title: Watchdog Unit Engages Invaders
keyMoments.description: Members of the Watchdog Unit engage the rescue party in combat, stabbing Paulie in the shoulder.
keyMoments.significance: First combat demonstration of the unit's effectiveness.

description: The Watchdog Unit of the Law are the first class guards at Enies Lobby under Baskerville's command. They are lean, muscular soldiers who ride large dogs and wield arm blades.

keyMoments.title: The Rocketman Takes Flight
keyMoments.description: The Straw Hats aboard the Rocketman soar through the air, flying over Enies Lobby's gates in a spectacular display of determination.
keyMoments.significance: Iconic moment representing the crew's unstoppable will to rescue Robin.

keyMoments.title: Robin and Franky Brought to Spandam
keyMoments.description: CP9 successfully brings their captives Robin and Franky before their leader Spandam at the Tower of Justice.
keyMoments.significance: CP9 completes their mission to capture Robin for the World Government.

keyMoments.title: Paulie Fights Watchdog Unit
keyMoments.description: Galley-La foreman Paulie fights against the Watchdog Unit despite being injured.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Galley-La's commitment to helping the Straw Hats rescue Robin.
